name: Draw of the Dice
description:
Draw of the Dice is an Inscryption-inspired card game where your monsters can be powered up using die cards. 🐲🃏🎲

Programming - Sherbert & Beilinson

Art - Blockhead Manic

Music & SFX - Tonogram (Twitter)

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Please download the build as the WebGL is not working for unknown reasons
